headline: Big Tech earnings watch: Microsoft, Amazon, & Apple
summary: Microsoft (MSFT), Amazon (AMZN), and Apple (AAPL) are some of the tech giants set to release earnings this week. Laffer Tengler Investments CEO and CIO Nancy Tengler tells Yahoo Finance that she's watching cloud revenue, artificial intelligence (AI) spending, margins, and more. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.
